reason.tex: %text Note that $\dfrac\pi{4} = \dfrac{3.14159\ldots}{4} < 1$ Also note that $\dfrac\pi{4} < 1 < \dfrac\pi{2}$ and therefore \[ \quad \tan 1 > \tan\frac\pi{4} \implies \tan 1 > 1 \] But $1 > \frac\pi{4} = \tan^{-1} 1$. Therefore \[ \underbrace{\tan 1 > 1 > \tan^{-1} 1 \implies \tan 1 > \tan^{-1} 1}_{a > b > c \implies a > c} \] %
